RoadmapPage.title: Roadmap to the Future
RoadmapPage.banner.title: Roadmap to the Future

RoadmapPage.roadmap.desc: Develop intelligent hardware products and core monitoring technology; build basic tools and apps to solve immediate user needs; establish initial data collection and management systems for the next phase.

Develop intelligent TCM diagnostic algorithms to improve monitoring accuracy; refine personalized recommendation systems for precise health management; expand open datasets to support more research and applications.

Build a complete developer ecosystem supporting third-party apps; expand to global markets and promote internationalization of TCM; deepen community building for shared growth between users and the platform.

RoadmapPage.footnote: We are moving step by step toward an intelligent TCM future, and look forward to your company.
RoadmapPage.seo.title: Roadmap to the Future - HeyTCM
RoadmapPage.seo.description: HeyTCM Roadmap: Learn about our development stages, goals, and future plans. Witness every step in intelligent TCM advancement.
RoadmapPage.seo.keywords: HeyTCM, roadmap, development plan, intelligent TCM, stage goals, future vision
